    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterSumIC

        public ClusterSumIC(ClusterBonds[] subClusters,
                    double[] subClusterWeights,
                    MayerFunction[] fArray,
                    MayerFunction[] f12)
        Parameters:
        subClusters - array of clusters corresponding to distribution functions
        subClusterWeights - weights for the clusters
        fArray - Mayer functions used in the clusters. the last one should be an instance of FR2. each subCluster should have an FR2 bond between the first two points.
        f12 - array of Mayer functions (between the first two points) for each cluster
